title: Eric Miller - Professional Problem Solver & People Leader
description: Eric Miller is a professional problem solver and people leader from Omaha, Nebraska. Eric is a Full-stack developer with over 20 years of experience.
heroImage_alt: A cartoon bust ninja with a round face
about: I am a Full-stack Engineer with 20+ years of experience driving success across diverse industries. Proven leader with a track record of building high-performing teams, delivering complex projects, and exceeding business goals. Currently seeking a challenging leadership or Solutions Architect role where I can leverage my diverse skills and experience to make a significant impact.
Motivate and empower teams to achieve th: Motivate and empower teams to achieve their full potential.
Develop innovative solutions to complex: Develop innovative solutions to complex challenges.
Extensive experience in software develop: Extensive experience in software development, web architecture, and cloud technologies.
Adept at leading teams in Scrum and othe: Adept at leading teams in Scrum and other agile methodologies.
Build strong relationships and foster a: Build strong relationships and foster a positive work environment.
Reduced production bugs by 40% and incre: Reduced production bugs by 40% and increased velocity by 30% at Orion Advisor Technology as Application Development Leader.
Spearheaded the development of a $7 mill: Spearheaded the development of a $7 million enterprise application at RSI Medical Staffing, increasing staff performance by 30% and recovering $1.7 million in lost revenue.
Successfully led two high-performing hig: Successfully led two high-performing high-profile development teams simultaneously of 20 members at Orion.
I mentored a team of 12 engineers at Moo: I mentored a team of 12 engineers at Moody`s Analytics while successfully managing a web application used by 800+ clients globally.
